query.queryString: (/article/relations/categories/collection/code='resultsPack,projectsInfoPack,brief' OR (/result/relations/categories/collection/code='deliverable,publication' OR contenttype='project')) AND ('SUSTAINABILITY' OR 'INNOVATION' OR 'MULTI-CRITERIA')

warnings.message: One of the fields on which a sort was requested does not exist

result.title: Written synthesis of ENABLE.EU’s findings
result.description: The deliverable will synthesize all the relevant scientific findings of ENABLE.EU. Particular attention will be paid to the most policy-relevant findings, especially those of particular interest for the R&I pillar of the Energy Union.

result.title: Nine national case study reports on governance barriers to the energy transition
result.description: The deliverable will report about the case studies carried out in Bulgaria, Germany, France, Hungary, Norway, Poland, Serbia, UK and Ukraine on the governance barriers to energy transition (task 5.3). The individual reports will present the research findings and the results of the semi-structured interviews.

result.title: Final report on social and cultural factors impacting energy choices and behaviour
result.description: The deliverable will synthetize the outcomes of the work carried out in task 4.4. It will consist of a sociological cross-country comparative analysis of the citizens’ opinions, attitudes and behaviour regarding socio-cultural, economic, technological and governance factors, driving energy choices on two distinct level – individual and collective ones.

result.title: Training courses
result.description: Consists of Total Efficiency Framework training courses to industrial community. These courses will be based on the previous developed training modules which were provide to the MAESTRI industrial pilots and will be oriented to teach the industrials to use MAESTRI managerial tools and methodologies. The courses will be addressed two target groups inside the industrial community, middle management and top-management. Then, two different courses will be organised as class lessons and will be left open for the participation to all industrial sectors.

result.title: Energy-aware User Profile vs. Persuasion, Incentivisation and Reaction Strategies Matrix
result.description: Description of the methodology used to produce the matrix that maps the user profiles against their corresponding strategies plus a report discussing the main findigns. Thus, this report will deal with how different strategies can effectively compensate any negative effects of socio-economic factors in energy saving behaviour. If it is required, a final version of the description of the methodology will be included in the D6.3 and D6.4.
